pr_title: [KEYCLOAK-11317] - IDP review profile allows empty username

timeline.message: [KEYCLOAK-11317] - IDP review profile allows empty username

timeline.bodyText:
I found this rather confusing and it actually took me quite a bit of time to decipher what's going on here.
I would change userNameRequired to validateUsername. Then change !realm.isRegistrationEmailAsUsername() && userNameRequired to validateUsername, and add !realm.isRegistrationEmailAsUsername() to L90. That'd make it a lot more obvious what's going on IMO.
timeline.author: stianst

replies.bodyText: Sure we can change. But It is just parametrizing whether or not the username is required instead of always obtaining it from the realm. Is that complicated ?
replies.author: pedroigor

replies.bodyText: IMO what I suggested would make the code a lot easier to read, and as I said I really did have to dig into this code to understand what was going on as I found it a bit confusing how it is now
replies.author: stianst
